snippet: Angelo Dundee, who died Wednesday at 90, was a master craftsman in the boxing trade.
abstract: An Appraisal on career of legendary boxing trainer Angelo Dundee; holds that Dundee was successful because he fluidly combined the skills of a premier psychologist, cut man, ring tactician, diplomat and public relations manager.
lead_paragraph: Angelo Dundee, who died Wednesday at 90, was a master craftsman in the boxing trade.

headline.seo: Angelo Dundee Was Boxing’s Quintessential ‘Confidence Man’
headline.main: Psychology and Guile in a One-Two Punch
headline.print_headline: Psychology and Guile In a One-Two Punch
